xyz.pugduddly.enderX.ui

Class Window

  • java.lang.Object
    • xyz.pugduddly.enderX.ui.Window
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AcceleratedWindow, PFMRootWindow

    public class Window
extends Object

    A Window. That’s it.

    • Constructor Summary

      Creates a new Window instance.

      • requestComponentFocus

        public boolean requestComponentFocus(Component component)

        Requests focus to be given to a Component. The component must be a subclass of Component.

        Parameters:
        component - The component to give focus to.
        Returns:
        whether the component has sucessfully been given focus.
        See Also:
        xyz.pugduddly.enderX.ui.Component

      • addKeyListener

        public Window addKeyListener(KeyListener keyListener)

        Adds the specified key listener to receive key events from this window. If keyListener is null, no exception is thrown and no action is performed.

        Parameters:
        keyListener - the key listener.
        Returns:
        the Window object, for convenience.
        See Also:
        KeyListener

      • removeKeyListener

        public Window removeKeyListener(KeyListener keyListener)

        Removes the specified key listener so that it no longer receives events from this window. This method performs no function, nor does it throw an exception, if the listener specified by the argument was not previously added to this window. If keyListener is null, no exception is thrown and no action is performed.

        Parameters:
        keyListener - the key listener.
        Returns:
        the Window object, for convenience.
        See Also:
        KeyListener

      • getKeyListeners

        public KeyListener[] getKeyListeners()

        Returns an array of all the key listeners registered on this window.

        Returns:
        all of this window’s KeyListeners or an empty array if no key listeners are currently registered
        See Also:
        KeyListener

      • addMouseListener

        public Window addMouseListener(MouseListener mouseListener)

        Adds the specified mouse listener to receive key events from this window. If mouseListener is null, no exception is thrown and no action is performed.

        Parameters:
        mouseListener - the mouse listener.
        Returns:
        the Window object, for convenience.
        See Also:
        MouseListener

      • removeMouseListener

        public Window removeMouseListener(MouseListener mouseListener)

        Removes the specified mouse listener so that it no longer receives events from this window. This method performs no function, nor does it throw an exception, if the listener specified by the argument was not previously added to this window. If mouseListener is null, no exception is thrown and no action is performed.

        Parameters:
        mouseListener - the mouse listener.
        Returns:
        the Window object, for convenience.
        See Also:
        MouseListener

      • setVisible

        public Window setVisible(boolean visible)

        Shows or hides this component depending on the value of parameter visible.

        Parameters:
        visible - if true, shows this window; otherwise, hides this window
        Returns:
        the Window object, for convenience.
        See Also:
        isVisible()
